# The `DILineInfoSpecifier` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Controls which fields of <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dilineinfo">DILineInfo</a> container should be filled with data. <a href="#details">More...</a>
